channel.title: Can you finish my script please (easy)
channel.description:
im just trying to make a script that keeps clicking in one spot so far all i have is this...
program Click; begin clickmouse (x,y,true) wait(100) end.
i will fill in the coords but i just need it to repeat
cant figure it out i tried a ton of the tuts... but the didnt help

item.title: Can you finish my script please (easy)
item.dc:creator: @Akuma Akuma
item.description:
@Akuma wrote:

program Click; begin repeat clickmouse (x,y,true) wait(100) until(false) end.

Read full topic

item.title: Can you finish my script please (easy)
item.dc:creator: @meep meep
item.description:
@meep wrote:

[code]program click;

const
x=(262); {This is x coordinate}
y=(168); {This is y coordinate}
WaitTime=(3000); {This is the wait time after each click}

procedure a;
begin
clickmouse(x,y, true);
wait(WaitTime);
end;

begin
repeat
a;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Better one. Made by Tarantula, but it’ll get the same effect.

Read full topic
